definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control

sentences.english: Jinhui12 is an excellent parental candidate in improving the characteristic of neck-panicle vascular bundles.
sentences.chinese: 縉恢12號是改良穗頸維管束性狀的優良親本。

sentences.english: It has been applied to attached algae and submerged vascular plants.
sentences.chinese: 這已經用於附生藻類和沉水維管束植物中。

sentences.english: Vascular bundles of the pedicel in flower of Commelina communis were scattered within central fundamental tissues.
sentences.chinese: 鴨跖草花梗頂部的維管束分佈在中央的基本組織內。

sentences.english: A preliminary study on the floristic analysis of vascular plants in the Mongolian Plateau and its neighbouring areas.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古高原及其鄰近地區的維管束植物區系分析初報。

sentences.english: Quantities of polysaccharide vesicles are transported in bulk through vascular bundles.
sentences.chinese: 含多糖的球形顆粒通過維管束在子葉中運輸。

sentences.english: There is the aleurone layer outside the bundle ring of the stems .
sentences.chinese: 莖中維管束環外有糊粉層。

sentences.english: Table 5 Effect of shading on sugar content of cob and grain pedicel …
sentences.chinese: 可溶性糖含量及籽粒小穗柄維管束截面積的影響。

sentences.english: A survey on the aquatic vascular plants of the Pearl River basin in Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 廣東境內珠江流域水生維管束植物區系的探討。

sentences.english: The 3vascular bundles in the main vein arrange in triangle.
sentences.chinese: 主脈有3個維管束，排列成三角狀。

sentences.english: There was no inverted vascular bundle developed in the bract scale of Thuja occidentals.
sentences.chinese: 崖柏屬雌球果的苞鱗中沒有倒轉的維管束形成。

sentences.english: A small vascular bundle at the back of the jaw characterizes the cheek of laboratory mice .
sentences.chinese: 在下巴後面，一個小的維管束描述實驗小鼠的臉頰。

sentences.english: Wilting toxins can induce to block the xylem of cotton seedling.
sentences.chinese: 致萎毒素可引起棉苗維管束系統堵塞。

sentences.english: The aerial stem is annual and has a ring of vascular bundle and low fiber content.
sentences.chinese: 地上莖一年生，維管束排成一圈，纖維含量低。

sentences.english: These parts of bundles in the stem be regarded as leaf trace.
sentences.chinese: 這種維管束斜生於莖內的部分，稱爲葉跡。

sentences.english: The vascular bundle of ovule of Phytolacca is evidently from the vascular tissue of receptacle.
sentences.chinese: 商陸屬植物的胚珠維管束明顯地來自花托的維管組織。

sentences.english: Bacterial wilt (P. solanacearum) is a vascular disease of plants.
sentences.chinese: 青枯病是由細菌引起植物枯萎的維管束病害。
